sqls.sql: SELECT id, profile_name, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt FROM profile
SELECT id, execute_sql, execute_result, profile_id, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, status FROM synchronization_store
INSERT INTO synchronization_store (execute_sql, execute_result, profile_id, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, status) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT id, execute_sql, execute_result, profile_id, create_by, create_dt, update_by, update_dt, status FROM synchronization_store where id = ?
select run_count from synchronization_store where id = ?
UPDATE synchronization_store SET execute_result = ?, run_count = ? where id = ?
